  • Package shapes.derived

    • Class shapes.derived.Circle

      class Circle extends VectorialObject implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • radius
          double radius
          The radius of the circle. Must be positive for valid area/perimeter calculations.
        • tags
          ArrayList<String> tags
          A list of user-defined tags associated with the circle.

    • Class shapes.derived.Rectangle

      class Rectangle extends VectorialObject implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • height
          double height
          The height of the rectangle.
        • width
          double width
          The width of the rectangle.

      class EditorFrame extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • canvas
          EditorPanel canvas
          Canvas panel where shapes are drawn and manipulated
        • file
          File file
          File used for saving and loading vector graphic data

    • Class view.EditorPanel

      class EditorPanel extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • currentMode
          EditorPanel.Mode currentMode
          Current interaction mode
        • currentShape
          VectorialObject currentShape
          Shape being currently drawn
        • defaultLineWidth
          double defaultLineWidth
          Default line width for shapes
        • fillColor
          Color fillColor
          Current fill color for new shapes
        • offsetX
          int offsetX
          Offset for dragging selected shape
        • offsetY
          int offsetY
          Offset for dragging selected shape
        • selectedShape
          VectorialObject selectedShape
          Currently selected shape for moving
        • shapes
          List<VectorialObject> shapes
          List of vector shapes currently on the canvas
        • sidebar
          SidebarPanel sidebar
          Sidebar panel reference for UI controls (not directly used here)
        • startX
          int startX
          Start coordinates for drawing new shape
        • startY
          int startY
          Start coordinates for drawing new shape
        • strokeColor
          Color strokeColor
          Current stroke color for new shapes
